name: AutoAnimeBot
description: Telegram Bot To Automate Your Anime Channels

TECHZ_API_KEY.description: Your TechZApi Key, Get from https://telegram.me/TechZApiBot

API_ID.description: Your Telegram API ID, Get from https://my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: Your Telegram API HASH, Get from https://my.telegram.org

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Telegram Bot Token, Get from https://telegram.me/BotFather

MONGO_DB_URI.description: Your MongoDB URI, Get from https://cloud.mongodb.com

STATUS_MSG_ID.description: ID of the message in your Uploads Channel where the status of bot will be showed

SCHEDULE_MSG_ID.description: ID of the message in your Uploads Channel where the schedule of bot will be showed

CHANNEL_TITLE.description: Name of your channel (This will appear in thumbnail of videos)

COMMENTS_GROUP_LINK.description: Link of your comments group (This must be linked to your index channel)
